alert.note: Alert for Hyde; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:02PM MDT until July 18 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HAND...SOUTHERN HYDE...SOUTHEASTERN HUGHES... NORTHEASTERN LYMAN AND NORTHWESTERN BUFFALO COUNTIES... At 701 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stephan, or 11 miles north of Lower Brule, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Thompson, Lower Brule, Stephan, Counselor Creek Boat Access Area, Tailrace Rec Area, Lake Sharpe, Lees Corner, West Bend Rec Area, Crow Creek Reservation and southeastern Lower Brule Reservation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
